name: Cortex
description: Cortex is a little puzzle game containing over 200 levels!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphique Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: All
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
